author: craigmcc
msg: Initial check-in of the Struts-Faces integration library, which will work
with the JavaServer Faces EA3 release that was recently made available.

author: martinc
msg: Replace EVAL_BODY_AGAIN with EVAL_BODY_TAG so that the code compiles

author: craigmcc
msg: Make it possible to build Struts against the Servlet 2.4 and JSP 2.0 APIs,
where the JSP classes have been pulled out into their own JAR file (jsp.jar).
On an earlier platform, you can leave the "jsp.jar" property unset and things
will continue to operate as they have before.

author: jmitchell
msg: 1. The docs were a little out of synch for the FrameTag.  I'm sure at some
point someone added the required action to the docs, but forgot to
change the 'must be one of' section (above it)
2. HiddenTag allows you to add bodycontent, but it is completely ignored.
